steganography

Class ImageSteganography

  • java.lang.Object
    • steganography.ImageSteganography

  • public class ImageSteganography
extends java.lang.Object
    This module provides the functionalities to the user.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Embed(java.lang.String Message, java.lang.String ImagePath, java.lang.String OutputImagePath)
      In this function, the required pixels are selected from the chosen cover image, and the encrypted message is embedded to the LSB of each RGB values of the image pixels.
      java.lang.String Extract(java.lang.String EmbeddedImagePath)
      In this function, the stego image is chosen, and the required pixels are selected for extracting the encrypted message out of the LSB bits of each RGB values of the image pixels.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageSteganography

        public ImageSteganography()

    • Method Detail

      • GenerateKey

        public void GenerateKey(int PrimeNo,
                        int PrimitiveRoot,
                        java.lang.String EncoderKeyPath,
                        java.lang.String DecoderKeyPath)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This function generates the key for encryption of the text that we would be embedding into the image. As here we use the Diffie Hellman key exchange algorithm which has a symmetric key approach, there must be a public key made by both encoder and decoder from which they make their shared secret key for encryption and decryption of text message.
        Parameters:
        PrimeNo - Prime Number
        PrimitiveRoot - Primitive Root of that Prime Number
        EncoderKeyPath - The path to where the Public Key of the Encoder to be saved
        DecoderKeyPath - The path to where the Public Key of the Decoder to be saved
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • Embed

        public void Embed(java.lang.String Message,
                  java.lang.String ImagePath,
                  java.lang.String OutputImagePath)
           throws java.io.IOException
        In this function, the required pixels are selected from the chosen cover image, and the encrypted message is embedded to the LSB of each RGB values of the image pixels. The stego image thus created will be stored in a suitable directory for user access.
        Parameters:
        Message - The Message to be embedded
        ImagePath - The path of the image to which the message is to be embedded
        OutputImagePath - The path to which the embedded image is to be saved (in png format)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • Extract

        public java.lang.String Extract(java.lang.String EmbeddedImagePath)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        In this function, the stego image is chosen, and the required pixels are selected for extracting the encrypted message out of the LSB bits of each RGB values of the image pixels.
        Parameters:
        EmbeddedImagePath - The path to the Embedded Image
        Returns:
        The Secret Message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
